text: Arau sipine eta yatraidala ahila, sihamte sihamtara pani sangraahakaka pani anibalai patha'i dile, si tara pani tola patrato nadata nama'i dile. Si anandata kai uthila, ‘ki sukhabara! Eya dekhona sisu’! Arau sihamte taka panyadrabya buli luka'i raakhile. Kintu sihamte yi karaichila se'i bisaye allaha sabisesa aragata
